item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: chanelle
item.content:encoded:
Privacy Policy for XOXO Productions (PTY) LTD

Effective Date: 26th October 2024
Last Updated: 26th October 2024

Welcome to XOXO Productions (PTY) LTD ("we," "our," "us"). This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your personal information when you visit our website www.xoxoproductions.net (the "Site") and interact with our services, including purchasing our luxury and self-care handmade body products.

By using our Site, you consent to the data practices described in this Privacy Policy.

1. Data Controller Information

Data Controller: XOXO Productions (PTY) LTD
Contact Information: Chanelle, chanelle@xoxoproductions.co.za
Address: 88 Mopani Road, Hennopspark, Centurion, Gauteng, 0172, South Africa

2. Personal Data We Collect

We collect and process the following types of personal data in compliance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and other applicable privacy laws:

  • Personal Identification Information: Full name, contact number, email address, shipping address, billing address
  • Order Information: Purchase details, payment method (note: we do not store credit card information), and transaction history
  • Browsing Information: IP address, browser type, device information, referring/exit pages, and interactions with the Site
  • Cookies: Information gathered via cookies to enhance user experience and website functionality (for details, see Section 8)

3. How We Use Your Data

We process your personal data to provide our services effectively, with your consent where applicable, and to fulfill our contractual and legal obligations. Specifically, we use your data for:

  • Order Processing: Managing orders, processing payments, arranging delivery, and providing customer support.
  • Communication: Sending confirmations, updates, and promotional offers if you have opted in to receive such communications.
  • Website Improvement: Analyzing Site usage to optimize user experience and enhance our products and services.
  • Legal Compliance: Complying with applicable legal, regulatory, and financial reporting obligations.

Legal Bases for Processing: We process personal data based on the following lawful grounds:

  1. Consent (for optional data processing, such as marketing communications).
  2. Contractual necessity (for order fulfillment and related support).
  3. Legitimate interests (for improving our Site and services).
  4. Legal obligations (for regulatory compliance).

4. Data Sharing and Disclosure

We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. However, we may share your data with:

  • Service Providers: Third-party vendors, such as payment processors, shipping providers, and customer support services, to fulfill your order.
  • Legal Requirements: Authorities or other entities when required by law, or to protect our rights and users’ rights.

We ensure that any third party with whom we share your data adheres to GDPR standards, safeguarding your personal information.

5. Data Retention

We retain personal data only as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy or as required by law. Specifically:

  • Order-related Data: Retained for 7 years for tax and accounting purposes.
  • Marketing Data: Retained until you opt-out or withdraw consent.

When we no longer require your personal data, we will delete or anonymize it in accordance with our data retention policies.

6. Security Measures

We are committed to protecting your personal information. We use industry-standard encryption, secure data storage, and access controls to safeguard your data. While we take significant steps to ensure data security, please note that no transmission over the internet is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

7. International Data Transfers

We are based in South Africa, but some of our service providers may process data outside the European Economic Area (EEA). If we transfer your data internationally, we ensure adequate protections, including using Standard Contractual Clauses or relying on equivalent mechanisms.

8. Cookies and Tracking Technologies

We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance the Site's functionality and improve your experience. Cookies are small files stored on your device that allow us to recognize you on future visits and tailor the Site to your preferences.

Types of Cookies We Use:

  • Essential Cookies: Necessary for basic Site functionality.
  • Performance Cookies: Collect anonymized data on how users interact with the Site.
  • Marketing Cookies: Track browsing habits for relevant advertising (if applicable).

You can manage your cookie preferences in your browser settings. Please note that disabling cookies may affect Site functionality.

9. Your Rights as a Data Subject

As a user, you have the following rights regarding your personal data:

  • Right of Access: Request details on the personal data we hold about you.
  • Right to Rectification: Request corrections to any inaccurate or incomplete data.
  • Right to Erasure: Request deletion of personal data, subject to certain legal limitations.
  • Right to Restrict Processing: Limit our processing of your data in specific circumstances.
  • Right to Data Portability: Request a copy of your data in a machine-readable format.
  • Right to Object: Object to data processing based on our legitimate interests.
  • Right to Withdraw Consent: If we process your data based on consent, you may withdraw it at any time.

To exercise any of these rights, please contact us at chanelle@xoxoproductions.co.za.

10. Marketing Communications

With your explicit consent, we may send you marketing communications about new products, promotions, or updates. You can unsubscribe from these emails at any time by clicking the "unsubscribe" link in the email or contacting us directly.

11. Children’s Privacy

Our Site is intended for users over the age of 16. We do not knowingly collect personal data from children under 16. If you believe we have inadvertently collected data from a child, please contact us immediately to request deletion.

12. Updates to This Privacy Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy occasionally to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. The "Last Updated" date at the beginning of this policy will indicate the latest revision. We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically.

13. Contact Information

If you have questions or concerns regarding this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

XOXO Productions (PTY) LTD
Email: chanelle@xoxoproductions.co.za
Address: 88 Mopani Road, Hennopspark, Centurion, Gauteng, 0172, South Africa

Thank you for trusting XOXO Productions (PTY) LTD with your personal information. We are dedicated to protecting your privacy and ensuring a safe, transparent experience.

item.title: About
item.dc:creator: chanelle
item.content:encoded:
ABOUT me

Hi! I'm Chanelle, and I'm a soap-making addict

I’m the founder and creative mind behind this brand dedicated to offering luxurious, natural body products. My journey began with a desire for quality, chemical-free products. With an eye for design and a passion for handcrafted excellence, I create each product to reflect the elegance and purity that define XOXO Productions. Based in Centurion, and as a wife of seven years and a mother of two beautiful children, family and wellbeing are at the heart of everything I create.

Thank you for supporting this journey and joining me in the beauty of natural care.

The XOXO philosophy

Pure Ingredients for Pure Indulgence

At XOXO Productions, we believe luxury begins with nature. Our products use only high-quality, natural ingredients, free from harmful chemicals to ensure your skin feels truly nourished.

Handmade with Love and Precision

Every product is crafted by hand with careful attention to detail. We believe in transforming everyday skincare into a personal ritual, where each item feels as special as you are.

Elegant Design, Inside and Out

Our approach blends simplicity with elegance. From our formulations to our packaging, we aim for a luxurious look and feel that adds beauty to your daily self-care routine.

Self-Care as a Lifestyle Choice

To us, self-care is essential, not just an indulgence. Our products support body and mind, bringing you wellness through the joy of quality skincare.

A Commitment to Conscious Beauty

We’re committed to sustainable, ethical practices. XOXO products are made to feel good on your skin and be gentle on the planet.

WE ARE VISIONARY

Transform everyday self-care into a ritual of natural luxury, where handcrafted quality and conscious beauty uplift body, mind, and spirit.

This reflects my dedication to creating luxurious, natural products that elevate daily routines, making self-care both intentional and beautiful.

MY MISSION

Goals aligning with our philosophy

At XOXO Productions, our mission is to create a self-care experience that blends natural luxury with thoughtful craftsmanship. Our goals focus on delivering high-quality, eco-conscious products that inspire mindful rituals and connect with a community of like-minded individuals who value quality, sustainability, and a bit of everyday indulgence. Here’s how we bring this vision to life.

  • Craft High-Quality, Natural Products
  • Promote Mindful Self-Care
  • Enhance Customer Experience and Engagement
  • Support Sustainable Practices
  • Build a Trusted Brand Community

This is a friendly reminder that as a small-batch artisan brand, online shopping is currently unavailable. All products, aside from soaps, are freshly crafted upon order to ensure premium quality and freshness.

To place an order, please email me directly at chanelle@xoxoproductions.co.za.

View my products

ABOUT me

Hi! I'm Chanelle, and I'm a soap-making addict

[elementor-element k="96b05d983259ab3d891b60977506db2c" data=""]

The XOXO philosophy

Pure Ingredients for Pure Indulgence

At XOXO Productions, we believe luxury begins with nature. Our products use only high-quality, natural ingredients, free from harmful chemicals to ensure your skin feels truly nourished.

Handmade with Love and Precision

Every product is crafted by hand with careful attention to detail. We believe in transforming everyday skincare into a personal ritual, where each item feels as special as you are.

Elegant Design, Inside and Out

Our approach blends simplicity with elegance. From our formulations to our packaging, we aim for a luxurious look and feel that adds beauty to your daily self-care routine.

Self-Care as a Lifestyle Choice

To us, self-care is essential, not just an indulgence. Our products support body and mind, bringing you wellness through the joy of quality skincare.

A Commitment to Conscious Beauty

We’re committed to sustainable, ethical practices. XOXO products are made to feel good on your skin and be gentle on the planet.

WE ARE VISIONARY

Transform everyday self-care into a ritual of natural luxury, where handcrafted quality and conscious beauty uplift body, mind, and spirit.

[elementor-element k="96b05d983259ab3d891b60977506db2c" data=""]
MY MISSION

Goals aligning with our philosophy

[elementor-element k="96b05d983259ab3d891b60977506db2c" data=""]
  • Craft High-Quality, Natural Products
  • Promote Mindful Self-Care
  • Enhance Customer Experience and Engagement
  • Support Sustainable Practices
  • Build a Trusted Brand Community
[elementor-element k="96b05d983259ab3d891b60977506db2c" data=""]

item.title: Products
item.dc:creator: chanelle
item.content:encoded:
Handcrafted Soaps

Please note that the soaps displayed above are examples of previous designs and are not currently available for purchase. If you would like a specific design replicated, feel free to reach out with your request. Newly available soaps will be listed below. Thank you for your interest!

Baby & Toddler

From gentle, baby-soft soaps to soothing bum creams, our collection offers only the purest products for your little one. Explore our range of natural soaps, nourishing body balms, and comforting bum balms, crafted with care for your baby and toddler’s delicate skin.

Body Soap:

  1. Delicacy (suitable from birth) R35
  2. Gentle Lavender (suitable from one year old) R45

Body Scrubs

Our Coffee and Sugar Body Scrub is crafted with premium ground coffee and uplifting sweet orange essential oil, delivering a rich, invigorating experience. For a cleansing touch, our Antibacterial Scrub blends the power of lavender, tea tree, and eucalyptus essential oils with brown sugar, almond oil, and castor oil. Each ingredient is chosen for its nourishing properties, bringing you a rejuvenating, skin-loving experience in every use. 

Lotion Bars & Lip Balms

Enjoy effortless hydration with our convenient lotion bars—simply warm the bar in your hands and massage onto any area needing a nourishing touch.

Choose between:

  1. Rose & Lavender
  2. Sweet Orange
  3. Rose & Vanilla
  4. Ylang-Ylang

Lip Balms:

  1. Mint
  2. Vanilla
  3. Rose & Lavender
  4. Rose & Vanilla
  5. Fragrance-free

Hand & Body

Our luxurious HAND BUTTER is crafted with skin-nourishing ingredients like beeswax, shea butter, and essential oils to provide deep, lasting hydration. In our BODY BUTTER collection, you’ll find two delightful options: Lavender & Sweet Orange, infused with rich mango butter for a silky finish, and a Fragrance-Free Shea Butter blend, perfect for sensitive skin.

Ointments

Bath Salts

Gentlemen's Range

We have 4 exclusive beard oil blends that contain Jojoba Oil and Argan Oil. Amongst many benefits, these oils provide moisturizing, conditioning, and the nutrients your beard needs. Because of the unique blend of essential oils, all 4 promotes hair growth and reduces hair loss.

The 4 different blends and their benefits:
Peppermint & Geranium
• Reduces itchiness
• Anti-bacterial
• Treats oily skin

Lemongrass & Tea Tree
• Anti-inflammatory
• Anti-septic
• Reduces razor burn
• Antibacterial

Cedarwood & Rosemary
• Anti-inflammatory
• Anti-septic
• Rejuvenates
• Stimulates skin cell growth
• Anti-fungal
• Reduces skin irritation

Sandalwood & bergamot
• Anti-inflammatory
• Anti-septic
• Full of anti-oxidants
• Promotes smooth & healthy-looking hair

We also do custom orders for events!!

Would you like to order or enquire ? Email me directly at chanelle@xoxoproductions.co.za or head on over to the Contact Us page.

Go to Contact Us page

item.title: Refund & Returns Policy
item.dc:creator: chanelle
item.content:encoded:
Effective Date: 26th October 2024

Thank you for shopping at XOXO Productions! We want you to feel confident in your purchase and be satisfied with our products. If, for any reason, you are not fully satisfied with your purchase, please review our Refunds and Returns Policy below for guidance on how to return items, applicable conditions, fees, and expected timeframes.

1. Eligibility for Returns and Refunds

To qualify for a return, please ensure that your item meets the following conditions:

  • Unused and Unopened: Products must be unused, in their original packaging, and sealed for hygiene reasons.
  • Return Window: Return requests must be made within 14 days of receiving the product.
  • Proof of Purchase: A receipt or order confirmation must accompany the return.

Note: Certain items, such as custom orders or items marked “Final Sale,” may not be eligible for returns or refunds. Please check the product details before purchasing.

2. Initiating a Return

If you would like to return an item, please follow these steps:

  1. Contact Us: Email us at chanelle@xoxoproductions.co.za with your order number, the reason for return, and any relevant product details.
  2. Approval: Once we receive your request, we will respond within 3 business days with instructions on how to proceed if your return is approved.
  3. Shipping: You will be responsible for paying the shipping costs associated with returning your item unless the return is due to a defect or an error on our part.

3. Return Shipping and Costs

  • Customer Responsibility: For returns not due to a product defect or error on our part, return shipping costs are the customer’s responsibility.
  • Packaging: Please ensure the product is securely packaged to avoid damage during shipping. XOXO Productions is not responsible for returns lost or damaged in transit.
  • Tracking Information: We recommend using a tracked shipping method for your return. Please share the tracking details with us to expedite the process.

4. Condition of Returned Items

Products that are returned must be:

  • Unused and Unopened: Returned items that show signs of use, damage, or tampering may not qualify for a refund.
  • In Original Packaging: Please return items in their original, undamaged packaging to ensure your refund is processed promptly.

XOXO Productions reserves the right to inspect all returned items before issuing a refund.

5. Refund Process and Timeframes

Once we receive and inspect your return, we will notify you of its approval status. If approved, your refund will be processed within 7-10 business days and credited to your original payment method.

Please note:

  • Partial Refunds: If items are not returned in original condition, we may issue a partial refund at our discretion.
  • Shipping Fees: Original shipping costs are non-refundable, except in cases of product defect or shipping error on our part.

6. Defective or Incorrect Items

If your product arrives damaged or incorrect, please contact us within 48 hours of delivery at chanelle@xoxoproductions.co.za with a photo and description of the issue. For verified cases of product defect or incorrect shipment:

  • We will cover return shipping costs.
  • You will be eligible for either a replacement product or a full refund, as preferred.

7. Customer Support and Questions

If you have any questions or require further assistance with your return or refund, please contact our Customer Support team:

Email: chanelle@xoxoproductions.co.za
Address: 88 Mopani Road, Hennopspark, Centurion, Gauteng, 0172, South Africa

We’re here to help make your experience with XOXO Productions as smooth and satisfying as possible!

Thank you for choosing XOXO Productions! We value your satisfaction and appreciate your understanding of our Refunds and Returns Policy.

item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: chanelle
item.content:encoded:
Naturally and Exquisitely Crafted

Discover exclusive, handcrafted natural products

Indulge in artisanal, chemical-free body products that nourishes. Our products are crafted for those who appreciate quality, and refined self-care.

Luxury self-care tips for a radiant lifestyle

Our blog curates the finest in luxury self-care, offering insights into transformative routines, artisanal products, and wellness practices designed for the discerning individual. Dive into a world where each moment becomes a sanctuary, enriched by beauty, relaxation, and the essence of pure indulgence. skincare.

Learn more About XOXO

Experience the Art of our products, Handmade with Purpose

Welcome to XOXO where nature meets luxury. Founded by Chanelle, XOXO Productions is dedicated to offering handmade body products crafted with the finest natural ingredients, free from harsh chemicals and artificial additives. Our passion lies in creating products that is not only gentle on your skin but also supportive of a healthy, conscious lifestyle. Each product is made with love, ensuring that every ingredient has a purpose—so you can indulge in skincare that nourishes, revitalizes, and rejuvenates.

At XOXO Productions, we believe our products is an art. Chanelle has brought her creativity to every aspect of the brand, from the thoughtfully curated ingredients to the elegant and sustainable packaging that makes each item a joy to use. We aim to elevate your self-care routine with products that feel indulgent, luxurious, and safe, reflecting the love and detail we pour into each creation. Thank you for joining us on this journey to embrace a more natural, beautiful, and meaningful approach to skincare.

Learn more https://xoxoproductions.net/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/VID_162681013_164105_361.mp4https://xoxoproductions.net/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/VID_163370602_154423_158.mp4https://xoxoproductions.net/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/VID_54100116_000528_313.mp4

Please Note:

As a small-batch artisan brand, online shopping is currently unavailable.

All products, aside from soaps, are freshly crafted upon order to ensure premium quality and freshness.

To place an order, please email me directly at chanelle@xoxoproductions.co.za.

product range

Discover Artistry in Every Product: A Natural, Small-Batch Collection, Crafted with Care

Soap

Indulge in the pure, nourishing experience of our handcrafted soaps. Each soap is carefully made from scratch, using natural oils and butters chosen for their skin-loving benefits. For those who enjoy a light fragrance, we use only essential oils to add a gentle scent, while most of our soaps remain fragrance-free to honor simplicity. Our beautiful, earthy colors come from natural clays, giving each bar its own unique character. Every soap is thoughtfully designed with a unique look, bringing a touch of artistry to your everyday self-care ritual.

Baby & Toddler
  1. Soap:
    • Delicacy (suitable from birth) 
    • Gentle Lavender (suitable from one year old)
  2. Bum Cream
  3. Body Balms:
    • Cocoa Butter
    • Mango Butter
Body Scrubs
  1. Coffee & Sugar Body Scrub
  2. Lavender & Tea Tree Antibacterial Scrub
Lotion Bars
  1. Rose & Vanilla
  2. Sweet Orange
  3. Rose & Lavender
  4. Ylang-Ylang
Hand & Body
  1. Hand Butter
  2. Shea Butter Body Butter (fragrance-free)
  3. Lavender & Sweet Orange Mango Butter Body Butter
Lip Balms
  1. Fragrance Free
  2. Rose & Vanilla
  3. Rose & Lavender
  4. Mint
  5. Vanilla
Ointments
  1. Cuticle Cream
  2. Olive Oil Skin Repair
  3. Anointing Oil
Bath Salts
  1. Chamomile, Rose & Lavender
  2. Vanilla & Rose Petal
  3. Calendula & Sweet Orange
Gentlemen's Range
  1. Peppermint & Geranium Beard Oil
  2. Lemongrass & Tea Tree Beard Oil
  3. Cedarwood & Rosemary Beard Oil
  4. Sandalwood & Bergamot Beard Oil
Learn More

TESTIMONIALS

"I received some of the best service I have had in a long time. Responses were received quickly, questions answered to my satisfaction. Collected my goodies today, all neatly packaged. I was very impressed, could smell the soap through the box. Definitely something I would recommend and use again. Thank you very much." - Maudie Hanssen

"Now this was a treat! Almost too pretty to use. These products are amazing, never spend hours looking for a "special gift" again…this is your one stop shop. Service is quick and as I said, amazing products. Let's support small businesses." - Lara Rene Smidt

Welcome to\u00a0XOXO<\/strong> <\/em>where nature meets luxury. Founded by Chanelle, XOXO Productions is dedicated to offering handmade body products crafted with the finest natural ingredients, free from harsh chemicals and artificial additives. Our passion lies in creating products that is not only gentle on your skin but also supportive of a healthy, conscious lifestyle. Each product is made with love, ensuring that every ingredient has a purpose\u2014so you can indulge in skincare that nourishes, revitalizes, and rejuvenates.<\/p>

At XOXO Productions, we believe our products is an art. Chanelle has brought her creativity to every aspect of the brand, from the thoughtfully curated ingredients to the elegant and sustainable packaging that makes each item a joy to use. We aim to elevate your self-care routine with products that feel indulgent, luxurious, and safe, reflecting the love and detail we pour into each creation. product range

Discover Artistry in Every Product: A Natural, Small-Batch Collection, Crafted with Care

Soap

Indulge in the pure, nourishing experience of our handcrafted soaps. Each soap is carefully made from scratch, using natural oils and butters chosen for their skin-loving benefits. For those who enjoy a light fragrance, we use only essential oils to add a gentle scent, while most of our soaps remain fragrance-free to honor simplicity. Our beautiful, earthy colors come from natural clays, giving each bar its own unique character. Every soap is thoughtfully designed with a unique look, bringing a touch of artistry to your everyday self-care ritual.

Baby & Toddler
  1. Soap:
    • Delicacy (suitable from birth) 
    • Gentle Lavender (suitable from one year old)
  2. Bum Cream
  3. Body Balms:
    • Cocoa Butter
    • Mango Butter
Body Scrubs
  1. Coffee & Sugar Body Scrub
  2. Lavender & Tea Tree Antibacterial Scrub
Lotion Bars
  1. Rose & Vanilla
  2. Sweet Orange
  3. Rose & Lavender
  4. Ylang-Ylang
Hand & Body
  1. Hand Butter
  2. Shea Butter Body Butter (fragrance-free)
  3. Lavender & Sweet Orange Mango Butter Body Butter
Lip Balms
  1. Fragrance Free
  2. Rose & Vanilla
  3. Rose & Lavender
  4. Mint
  5. Vanilla

item.title: Terms & Conditions
item.dc:creator: chanelle
item.content:encoded:
Terms and Conditions of Use for XOXO Productions (PTY) LTD

Effective Date: 26th October 2024

Thank you for visiting XOXO Productions! Please read these Terms and Conditions carefully, as they set out the legal terms governing your use of our website, www.xoxoproductions.net (the “Site”). By accessing or using the Site, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree to these terms, please refrain from using the Site.

1. About Us

Company Name: XOXO Productions (PTY) LTD
Address: 88 Mopani Road, Hennopspark, Centurion, Gauteng, 0172, South Africa
Email: chanelle@xoxoproductions.co.za

XOXO Productions provides handmade body products for individuals seeking luxury and self-care solutions. All products are crafted with quality ingredients and designed to enhance your self-care routine.

2. Eligibility

By using our Site, you confirm that you are at least 18 years old, or, if you are under 18, that you have obtained consent from a parent or guardian to use the Site and agree to these Terms on your behalf.

3. Use of the Site

You agree to use the Site solely for personal and non-commercial purposes, including browsing our product offerings, placing orders, and accessing other resources we may provide. You must not use the Site for any unlawful or unauthorized purpose.

4. Product Information and Availability

All descriptions, images, and specifications of products on our Site are accurate to the best of our ability. However, colors, sizes, and details may vary slightly depending on your device display and individual product characteristics. We reserve the right to modify or discontinue any product at any time without prior notice.

5. Orders and Payments

By placing an order through the Site, you agree to the following terms:

  • Pricing: All prices are displayed in the local currency and include applicable taxes, unless otherwise specified.
  • Order Acceptance: Once you place an order, you will receive a confirmation email. We reserve the right to refuse or cancel any order at our discretion, including cases where products are unavailable, pricing errors occur, or payment is not authorized.
  • Payment Methods: We accept a variety of payment methods provided on the checkout page. Payment details are processed securely, and we do not store payment card information on our servers.

6. Shipping and Delivery

We strive to process and ship orders promptly. Delivery times are estimates and may vary based on location and carrier availability. XOXO Productions is not responsible for delays outside our control.

  • Shipping Fees: Shipping costs will be added to your order total and displayed at checkout.
  • International Shipping: For orders outside South Africa, customs duties and import taxes may apply, which are the customer’s responsibility.

7. Returns and Refunds

Our goal is to ensure you are satisfied with your purchase. If you are not completely happy with an item, please contact us at chanelle@xoxoproductions.co.za within 14 days of receipt to initiate a return.

  • Eligibility: Items must be unused, in original packaging, and accompanied by a receipt.
  • Refunds: Approved returns will be refunded to the original payment method, minus any applicable shipping fees.
  • Exclusions: Custom orders and items marked “Final Sale” are not eligible for return or refund.

8. Intellectual Property

All content, including images, logos, text, product descriptions, graphics, and other materials on the Site, is owned or licensed by XOXO Productions (PTY) LTD and protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws. You may not reproduce, distribute, modify, or otherwise exploit our content without prior written permission.

9. User-Generated Content

You may have the option to leave reviews or provide feedback on the Site. By submitting any content, you grant XOXO Productions a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free, and perpetual right to use, display, modify, and distribute your content for promotional purposes.

  • Prohibited Content: You agree not to post content that is illegal, defamatory, obscene, or otherwise inappropriate. We reserve the right to remove any content that violates these Terms or is deemed harmful.

10. Third-Party Links

Our Site may contain links to third-party websites or resources. These links are provided for convenience and do not imply endorsement or responsibility for the content on these external sites. Use of third-party links is at your own risk.

11. Limitation of Liability

To the fullest extent permitted by law, XOXO Productions (PTY) LTD and its affiliates, directors, employees, and agents shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages resulting from:

  • Use or inability to use the Site.
  • Unauthorized access to your personal data.
  • Any product purchased through our Site.
